name: [GGJ 2023] Runaway Mower
description:
Made by university students during Global Game Jam 2023, this years theme: Roots

Brought to you by Shack in the Woods Studios...

Runaway Mower is a fast-paced and exciting vehicle game set in the sprawling Penryn Hills. The protagonist, Max Special, is a root beer fanatic with a custom lawnmower that he has outfitted for high-speed cutting. With his trusty lawnmower by his side, Max sets out on a wild journey through the hills, dodging obstacles and destroying roots along the way.

As he races through the hills, Max must constantly upgrade his lawnmower to stay ahead of the cutting competition. With each upgrade, he becomes faster, grippier and more agile, allowing him to tackle even tougher challenges. From breathtaking jumps to nail-biting close calls, Max's root beer-fueled journey is filled with excitement and thrills.

With gorgeous graphics and a revolutionary physics system, "Runaway Mower" is the perfect game for anyone looking for a fast-paced, adrenaline-fueled adventure. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a newcomer to the world of video games, this game is sure to keep you entertained from start to finish. So hold down your arrow keys and join Max on a mowing bonanza through the meadows of Penryn!

---

Featuring multiple upgradable mowers and a familiar ragdoll system.
